execution_plan.description: Aggregate total EUR revenue by country from the sales_eu database.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT customers.country AS s1__country, SUM(orders.total_eur) AS s1__revenue_eur
FROM customers
JOIN orders ON customers.id = orders.customer_id
GROUP BY customers.country;

execution_plan.description: Aggregate total EUR revenue by country from the sales_us database.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT customers.country AS s2__country, SUM(orders.total_eur) AS s2__revenue_eur
FROM customers
JOIN orders ON customers.id = orders.customer_id
GROUP BY customers.country;

execution_plan.description: Combine aggregated per-country revenues from both regions and compute total revenue per country (EUR equivalent).
execution_plan.query:
SELECT COALESCE($step1.s1__country, $step2.s2__country) AS s3__country,
       COALESCE($step1.s1__revenue_eur, 0) + COALESCE($step2.s2__revenue_eur, 0) AS s3__total_revenue_eur
-- Placeholders $step1.* and $step2.* refer to the aggregated result rows from steps 1 and 2 respectively.
